name: Visual Quality Analysis
description: Comprehensive visual quality checks for all UI components

tests.name: Button Component Visual Quality
tests.description: Check button shadows, borders, alignment, and colors

params.prompt:
Analyze the button components in this screenshot. Check for:
1. Shadow depth - Are any shadows abnormally deep or blurry compared to nearby elements?
2. Border overflow - Do borders have any corner artifacts or overflow?
3. Alignment - Are button contents (text/icons) properly centered?
4. Color consistency - Are colors uniform across similar button states?
5. Spacing - Is padding consistent within buttons?

Provide a detailed analysis with specific issues found.

tests.name: Form Component Visual Quality
tests.description: Check form inputs, labels, and validation states

params.prompt:
Analyze the form components in this screenshot. Check for:
1. Input field borders - Are borders consistent and properly aligned?
2. Label positioning - Are labels correctly aligned with inputs?
3. Validation states - Are error/success states visually distinct?
4. Spacing - Is there consistent spacing between form elements?
5. Typography - Are fonts consistent in labels and placeholders?

Identify any visual inconsistencies or design issues.

tests.name: Avatar Component Visual Quality
tests.description: Check avatar sizing, borders, and positioning

params.prompt:
Analyze the avatar components. Check for:
1. Border radius - Are circular avatars perfectly round?
2. Image fitting - Do images fill the avatar container properly?
3. Border shadows - Are shadow effects consistent?
4. Size consistency - Are different sizes proportionally correct?
5. Group alignment - In avatar groups, is overlap/positioning correct?

tests.name: Card Component Visual Quality
tests.description: Check card shadows, borders, and content layout

params.prompt:
Analyze card/display components. Check for:
1. Card shadows - Are shadows natural and consistent in depth/direction?
2. Border radius - Are corners consistently rounded?
3. Content padding - Is internal spacing appropriate?
4. Border overflow - Any content clipping at rounded corners?
5. Visual hierarchy - Is there clear content organization?

tests.name: Table Component Visual Quality
tests.description: Check table layout, borders, and alignment

params.prompt:
Analyze table components. Check for:
1. Column alignment - Are columns properly aligned?
2. Row borders - Are horizontal/vertical borders consistent?
3. Header styling - Is the header visually distinct?
4. Cell padding - Is content spacing appropriate?
5. Zebra striping - If present, is it subtle and consistent?

tests.name: Navigation Component Visual Quality
tests.description: Check navigation alignment and hover states

params.prompt:
Analyze navigation components. Check for:
1. Item alignment - Are nav items evenly spaced and aligned?
2. Active state - Is the active/current item clearly indicated?
3. Hover states - Are hover effects subtle but noticeable?
4. Icon alignment - Are icons aligned with text labels?
5. Responsive behavior - Does layout adapt appropriately?

Analyze timeline components. Check for:
1. Vertical alignment - Is the timeline line perfectly vertical?
2. Node positioning - Are timeline dots/nodes centered on the line?
3. Content alignment - Is content aligned with corresponding nodes?
4. Spacing consistency - Are intervals between items even?
5. Connector styling - Are lines/dots visually consistent?
